item.title: Gregory add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Any asshole can chase a skirt, art takes discipline." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "those who escape hell however never talk about it and nothing much bothers them after that." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Sex is kicking death in the ass while singing." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I wanted the whole world or nothing." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Poetry is what happens when nothing else can." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "What do you think an artist is? ...he is a political being, constantly aware of the heart breaking, passionate, or delightful things that happen in the world, shaping himself completely in their image. Painting is not done to decorate apartments. It is an instrument of war." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "When I was a child my mother said to me, 'If you become a soldier, you'll be a general. If you become a monk, you'll be the pope.' Instead I became a painter and wound up as Picasso." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "At the age of six I wanted to be a cook. At seven I wanted to be Napoleon. And my ambition has been growing steadily ever since." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "The only difference between me and a madman is I'm not mad." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "It never got weird enough for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson
